Actions.Text: REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION
REFERRED TO CONSUMER AFFAIRS AND PROTECTION

Title: Prohibits unauthorized listing of food places on the application and/or website of food delivery platforms
Summary: Prohibits unauthorized listing of food places on the application and/or website of food delivery platforms.
LawCode: Add ยง391-v, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to prohibiting unauthorized listing of food places on the application and/or website of food delivery platforms
